scripts.api:clean: docker stop feature-api; docker rmi feature/api
scripts.api:all: npm run api:clean; npm run api:build; npm run api:run
scripts.nginx:clean: docker stop feature-nginx; docker rmi feature/nginx
scripts.nginx:all: npm run nginx:clean; npm run nginx:build; npm run nginx:run
scripts.redis:run: docker run -d --rm --network feature-net -v feature-redis-data --name feature-redis redis:7.4.0-bookworm redis-server
scripts.redis:connect: docker run -it --rm --network feature-net redis:7.4.0-bookworm redis-cli -h feature-redis
